statements: DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE object_detected = 'Person' AND camera_id = 3;
DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE id = 100 AND camera_id = 1;
DELETE FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01 12:00:00' AND object_detected = 'person';
DELETE FROM camera_footage WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND duration > 60;
DELETE FROM footage_metadata WHERE event_type = 'Motion Detection';
DELETE FROM events WHERE camera_id = 3 AND event_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MotionDetection WHERE camera_id = 2001 AND detection_time < '2021-10-01';
